message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more upfront, you lose less to inflation in the long run.
Let's be realistic, Alice. I'm taking on more risk with inflation.
The offer needs to be more balanced for me to accept, Bob.  Time is running out for both of us.
This is my bottom line, Alice. Take it or leave it. We both lose if we keep going.
Okay, Bob, I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle. This is a fair deal considering the time pressure.
